translations: 上升（ascend 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: In this manner, he ascended gradually to the highest.
sentences.translation: 就这样，他逐渐上升到最高层。

sentences.sentence: He ascended rapidly—much more rapidly than he anticipated—and rose above San Pedro.
sentences.translation: 他上升得很快——比他预想的快多了——升到了圣佩德罗上空。
